output:

    extra_dependencies: 
      threeparttable:
      booktabs:

    number_sections: true
    toc: true 
params:
  save: false
  dir: '.'

```{r,setup,message = FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(yspec)
library(pmtables)

spec <- ys_help$spec()

units <- ys_get_unit(spec, parens = TRUE)
```


\clearpage


# Basic table

```{r, results = "asis"}

out <- stable(pmt_summarized)

pt_wrap(out, con = stdout()) 

```


```{r}
if(params$save) {
  stable_save(out, file = "basic-table.tex", dir = params$dir)   
}
```
